trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event occurs when a control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>händelsen inträffar när en kontroll ritas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: A PaintEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> to use to paint the control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: En PaintEventArgs anger den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>du använder för att rita kontrollen och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A>där paint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om händelsemodellen finns [händelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and clipping rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> klass med angivna grafik och urklippet rektangel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>identifieras av den `graphics` parametern har tagits bort när den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>har tagits bort.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar rektangeln att rita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar rektangeln att rita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> där paint.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa Dispose när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Dispose lämnar den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>oanvändbar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>var upptar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet avyttra innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De resurser som den använder frigörs annars inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> och släpper du de hantera resurserna.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av allmänheten `Dispose()` metod och <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`anropar metoden skyddade Dispose med den `disposing` parametern `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>anropar `Dispose` med `disposing` inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är true, den här metoden Frigör alla resurser som innehas av alla hanterade objekt som den här <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>referenser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar den `Dispose()` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Frisläpp endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter ett objekt att frigöra de resurser och utföra andra innan skräpinsamling få tillbaka.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar bilderna som används för att rita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt som används för att rita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet innehåller metoder för att rita objekt på visningsenhet.
